text:
You are building new applications and innovating
to better serve your customers with AWS resources

such as Amazon EC2 instances, Kinesis streams,
and DynamoDB tables, across many AWS Regions.

And as you grow, so does your need to efficiently
manage your resources at scale.

With AWS Resource Explorer, you can search
for and discover your resources easily using

freeform text and filters including application
names, tags, and other metadata, across AWS

Regions with a single search. The most relevant
resources appear at the top of your search

results, so you can navigate directly to them with
a single click and take action in the appropriate

service console and Region, saving you time
and effort.

As an AWS managed capability, AWS Resource
Explorer helps you efficiently and securely

manage your ever-growing applications and
resources at scale. Learn more about how to
get started with AWS Resource Explorer
